title: Biography

fields.label: Full Name
fields.name: biography_name
fields.instructions: (Display name) The name of the subject of this biography

fields.label: Last Name
fields.name: biography_lastname
fields.instructions: The last name of the subject of this biography, for alphabetical order in display

fields.label: Biography Author
fields.name: biography_author
fields.instructions: The name of the person writing this biography

fields.label: Country of Origin/Citizenship
fields.name: country_of_origin_citizenship
fields.instructions: Ex. "United States/American"

fields.label: Works Cited
fields.name: works_cited
fields.instructions: To increase the size of this field, drag this text area from the lower-right corner.

description: Biographical information, used in the Biographies content type

title: Close Readings: Left Text

fields.label: Left Text Title
fields.name: cr_left_text_title
fields.instructions: Title of the left-side text

fields.label: Left Text Author
fields.name: cr_left_text_author
fields.instructions: Name of the left-side text author(s)

fields.label: Left Text Link
fields.name: cr_left_text_link
fields.instructions: Link to the left-side text, if available online.

fields.label: Left Text Citation
fields.name: cr_left_text_citation
fields.instructions: Citation for the left-side text, if available.

fields.label: Left Text Content
fields.name: cr_left_text_content
fields.instructions: Write or paste the left-side text itself here.  (This will appear in the main text area, to the left, or above if viewed on a smaller screen.)

description: The text to be displayed in the left half of the Close Readings interface

title: Close Readings Right Text

fields.label: Right Text Title
fields.name: cr_right_text_title
fields.instructions: Title of the right-hand text

fields.label: Right Text Author
fields.name: cr_right_text_author
fields.instructions: Name of the right-side text author(s)

fields.label: Right Text Link
fields.name: cr_right_text_link
fields.instructions: Link to the right-side text , if available online.

fields.label: Right Text Citation
fields.name: cr_right_text_citation
fields.instructions: Citation for right-side text, if available.

fields.label: Right Text Content
fields.name: cr_right_text_content
fields.instructions: Write or paste the right-side text itself here.  (This will appear in the secondary text area, to the right, or below if viewed on a smaller screen.)

description: The text to be displayed in the right half of the Close Readings interface

title: Collection: Collection Metadata

fields.label: Collection Title
fields.name: dhs_collection_title
fields.instructions: Overall collection title, to be used in the <dc:title> tag. (Ex: the Mina Loy collection is titled "Mina Loy Baedeker: Scholarly Handbook for Digital Travelers")

fields.label: Shorthand Reference
fields.name: dhs_shorthand_ref
fields.instructions: Shorthand archive reference name, for use in the <collex:archive> field.  (Ex: Mina Loy collection uses the shorthand archive reference "loy")

fields.label: Collection Federations
fields.name: dhs_federations
fields.instructions: Federation name for RDF Metadata, e.g. ModNets. Supports multiple values. Click "Add Federation" to add one or more Federations.

fields.label: Authors
fields.name: dhs_authors
fields.instructions: Author names for RDF Metadata. Supports multiple values. Click "Add Author" to add one or more Authors.

fields.label: Editors
fields.name: dhs_editors
fields.instructions: Editor names for RDF Metadata. Supports multiple values. Click "Add Editor" to add one or more Editors.

fields.label: Creators
fields.name: dhs_creators
fields.instructions: Creator names for RDF Metadata. Supports multiple values. Click "Add Creator" to add one or more Creators.

fields.label: Date
fields.name: dhs_date
fields.instructions: Date published, in DD/MM/YYYY format.

fields.label: Genres
fields.name: dhs_genres
fields.instructions: Genres for RDF Metadata. Supports multiple values. Click "Add Genre" to add one or more genres.

fields.label: Disciplines
fields.name: dhs_disciplines
fields.instructions: Disciplines for RDF Metadata. Supports multiple values. Click "Add Displine" to add one or more disciplines.

fields.label: Collex Text
fields.name: dhs_collex_text
fields.instructions: Text to be displayed in the <collex:text> field, as a description of the entire collection.

description: This is the metadata set used for top-level Collection objects.  There should only be one page with this template per Collection.  Child objects, called "Chapters," can be added to this, and grandchild objects called "Sections" can be added to Chapters.  This page will automatically show a grid of all child Chapters.

title: Collection: Chapter Metadata

fields.label: Genres
fields.name: dhs_genres
fields.instructions: Use the "Add Genre" button to add as many genres as apply to this collection

fields.label: Disciplines
fields.name: dhs_disciplines
fields.instructions: Use the "Add Discipline" button to add as many disciplines as relate to this resource.  At least one is required.

fields.label: Peer Reviewed
fields.name: dhs_peer_reviewed
fields.instructions: Whether this chapter or collection has been peer reviewed

fields.label: Peer Review Date
fields.name: dhs_peer_review_date
fields.instructions: The date of most recent peer review

description: This is the metadata set used for second-level Collection objects, called "Chapters," children of "Books."  Chapters contain child objects called "Sections."

fields.label: Media Type
fields.name: media_type
fields.instructions: The type of media this contribution contains

fields.label: Use Real Name
fields.name: use_real_name
fields.instructions: Whether or not this contributor wishes to use a real name

fields.label: First Name
fields.name: first_name
fields.instructions: (Optional)

fields.label: Last Name
fields.name: last_name
fields.instructions: (Optional)

fields.label: Preferred Name
fields.name: preferred_name
fields.instructions: (Optional) Use this field if a user wishes to use a pseudonym instead of a name.  This field will not be shown publicly if a real name is provided.

fields.label: Email Address
fields.name: email_address
fields.instructions: Contributor's email address.  Leave blank if the contributor does not wish to share their email address publicly.

fields.label: Institutional Affiliation
fields.name: institutional_affiliation
fields.instructions: (Optional)

fields.label: Occupation
fields.name: occupation
fields.instructions: (Optional)

fields.label: Additional Authors
fields.name: additional_authors
fields.instructions: List any additional authors by their full names. (These names will be displayed publicly with this post, if included here.)

fields.label: Media URL
fields.name: media_url
fields.instructions: Plaintext hyperlink (not an embed code) to the web player for this content.  (YouTube, SoundCloud, etc.)  Please note: This will not add the video to the post below!  This will be shown only in the PDF print view.  Videos/Audio/etc must still be added to the post, via embed codes.  See site documentation for instructions.

fields.label: Genres
fields.name: ml_genres
fields.instructions: Use the "Add Genre" button to add as many genres as apply to this collection

fields.label: Disciplines
fields.name: ml_disciplines
fields.instructions: Use the "Add Discipline" button to add as many disciplines as relate to this resource.  At least one is required.

fields.label: Peer Reviewed
fields.name: ml_peer_reviewed
fields.instructions: Whether this chapter or collection has been peer reviewed

fields.label: Peer Review Date
fields.name: ml_reviewdate
fields.instructions: The date of most recent peer review
